"A.P.238/4/9/12:30": "That's enough! That was great! You really showed me how hard you work!"
"...Hmm. Your performance was a little lacking!"
"But your spirit took you right to the finish line! That's all ARKS need!"
"You didn't win the top prize, but your spirit proved itself!"
"A flawless result! This was a brilliant plan! I'm a genius!"
"Well, it was really down to your effort as participants!"
"Now, head on home! Everyone is waiting f..."
"...Gah!! What's this feeling...!"
"Hey, who's that...! I know there's someone there, come on out!"
"Not too sharp for ARKS."
"I was trying to hide so as not to interfere, but I'm still not used to this body."
"Hm? Is there something wrong? I think I look normal enough, don't I?"
"Oh, are you mad about my peeping? Come on now, no need to be upset, it's just a bit of fun, right?"
"And besides..."
"I wanted to see the one who held back [Elder] with my own eyes."
"[Elder]... the Dark Falz from before...!"
"Don't worry, I don't feel like fighting right now."
"Don't be so stiff, relax, relax. I'll leave soon."
"Hey, hey!"
"What. I'm leaving, so don't expect anything from me, unless you want to die."
"You... that face... Just who are you...!"
"Your enemy."
"Or would 'you alone are ourenemies' be more accurate?"
"Honestly, I should kill you just for having met me here..."
"Why..? I'm feeling nice today, so I'll let it slide."
"Well then. When we next meet, I'll probably kill you right away, so watch out."
"...You saw that just now."
"That way of speaking... that presence... That feeling of overwhelming intimidation... Hey, parther, that was..."
"It might be... Dark Falz"
"She looked like that one with the mask"
"If you think so too, then that's probably what it was."
"Yeah, it felt like that person we ran into on Naberius."

"But... this time, there was an intimidating feeling, like that Dark Falz before..."
st_013440_0370#0,"As if it's even at war with itself..."""
"...but why. Why do you have that face...!"
"...Sorry. I was a little disturbed. I'm not really sure why."
"Haha... guess my bad feeling was on the money..."
"I'm so tired of all these enemies who want me to fail..."
